name: Magical Girl vs Forest of Evil
name_original: Magical Girl vs Forest of Evil
description:
When the Forest of Evil threatens the peace of the kingdom by wanting to eat your people, who will the King call upon? THE MAGICAL GIRL OF COURSE! Use your magical powers to help protect the kingdom from demonic flowers, monstrous mushrooms and terror trees. Protect everyone for as long as you can and learn new, powerful spells to save the day.

- Fire Magic Wand

Q - Throw Thorn Whip

W - Rain Thorns

E - Fire Magic Blast

ESC - Pause Game
